articles.author: Mirror Now
articles.title: Schools partially reopen in Delhi as Covid cases dip
articles.description: Schools have finally reopened in the national capital today. But, they have only resumed partially. Higher education institutes, coaching centres and classes from 9th to 12th have resumed.
articles.content: Schools have finally reopened in the national capital today. But, they have only resumed partially. Higher education institutes, coaching centres and classes from 9th to 12th have resumed.
